title: The final trailer for Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets shows an incredible sci-fi universe

description: Valerian and The City of a Thousand Planets is the new adventure film from Luc Besson, director of The Professional, The Fifth Element and Lucy, based on the French comic book series, Valerian and Laureline. Valerian stars Dane DeHaan, Cara Delevingne, Clive Owen and Rihanna and hits theaters on July 21, 2017.
title: Valerian and The City of a Thousand Planets - Final Trailer - IGN Video
